page.title: 19SPORTS ACTIVITIES B/BRIGGS
page.content:
The variety of sports facilities available at Bishopbriggs Sports Centre is as follows:- {Air weapons;}Aikido;{Archery; Badminton;{Basketball; Bowling(Carpet);{Boxing; Cricket(Practice);{Dance and Movement; Fencing;{Five-a-side Football; Golf(Practice);{Gymnastics;}Indoor Hockey;{Judo;}Karate;{Keep Fit;}Lawn Tennis;{Netball;}Squash;{Swimming(All {forms including Water Polo, Survival, {and Life Saving);}Table Tennis; {Trampolining;}Volleyball;{Weight {Training and Lifting;}Wrestling;{Yoga.
The facilities are there for the use of everyone especially the individual as well as small and family groups. Clubs also exist for those activities which prosper in such an environment. It is run by Strathkelvin D.C.
